title: Field Remedy: 2579
subject:
Washer system, pump - Without
function
cause:
Washer system fuse blown due to frozen
washer fluid.

remedyContent.text:
In case of customer complaint perform the following checks prior 
washer pump replacement:

items: Check if the antifreezing concentrate is OK, respectively that
the washer fluid/system is not frozen.

remedyContent.text:
If the concentrate is insufficient/the washer fluid is frozen, 
    inform the customer about the correct mixture and/or refer to 
    the owner manual.

items: If the washer fluid is frozen, defrost the washer system and
fill-up washer system with washer fluid in correct mixture.
Check the function of the pump and nozzles of the washer
system if necessary replace the washer system fuse.

remedyContent.text:
Note: A frozen pump will cause the fuse to blow through
again.
